column4: is there a guide for switching to dapper? i've got a system i want to sue jsut to mess around with, and perhaps file some bug reports. is it jsut a matter of switching all instances of "hoardy" with "dapper" in the sources.list?
you just change all hoary to dapper and then do a sudo apt-get dist-upgrade
after a sudo apt-get update, i'm assuming? ;)
